code: import request from'util/request';import{apiPrefix}from'util/config';var ApiRequest=function ApiRequest(path,data){var url=apiPrefix+path;var method='GET';var paramsArray=path.split(' ');if(paramsArray.length===2){method=paramsArray[0];url=apiPrefix+paramsArray[1];}return request({url:url,data:data,method:method});};export default ApiRequest;
